channel.title: virtualbox on Mariel's GitHub page
channel.description: Recent content in virtualbox on Mariel's GitHub page

item.title: Kernel panic with VirtualBox and CentOS
item.description: This week I was given a task that required me to use a CentOS virtual machine image. Typically, I use VirtualBox and it was also recommended using this hypervisor. Importing the image should have been a straightforward process, yet it was more educational.
